title: A feminine response to Iceland's financial crash
description: Halla Tómasdóttir managed to take her company Audur Capital through the eye of the financial storm in Iceland by applying 5 traditionally "feminine" values to financial services. At TEDWomen, she talks about these values and the importance of balance.
author: Halla Tómasdóttir
keywords: TED, talks, business, feminism, politics, women, women in business
